title: Chapter 1848 - Re-Establishing The Central Immortal Court
body:
Chapter 1848 - Re-Establishing The Central Immortal Court

An ocean wind blew past the deep blue dome of heaven.

It was unusually good weather for the perpetually windswept Eastern Sea.

Qing Wu stood on board a treasure ship within these boundless waters, her blue dress fluttering in the wind, her sultry curves coming in and out of view.

Her skin was smooth and fairer than snow, and her features were exquisite. She was a rare, extraordinary beauty. However, those who knew who she was wouldn’t dare to harbor any covetous thoughts about her.

“Why isn’t he here yet?” Only a day had passed, but Qing Wu couldn’t help but frown. It wasn’t that she was in a hurry, but she was worried Su Yi wouldn’t show up.

Suddenly, an old man with a turtle shell on his back rode in over the waves.

“Are you perhaps Her Excellency Qing Wu?” The old man stood in the distance and said in a quavering voice.

Qing Wu was stunned. “I am.”

She could tell that the old man was merely a Universe Realm Immortal. He was entirely beneath her notice.

“This junior has come on orders to deliver a message!” said the old man. He took out a communication talisman and proffered it to her from afar.

Qing Wu accepted it and scanned its comments. It read:...
original_title: Chapter 1848 - Re-Establishing the Central Immortal Court
